channel.title: A moderator please read! I desprately need help, PLEASE!
channel.description:
HI! This is Akl another moparscaper just like all of you but he's been going through some problems lately, with his server registered he was quite happy! But the next day was not at all for his satisification... He could not register his as a matter of fact it said continuosuly , [b]" You can only post one server at a time! "[/b] But that time has [b]GONE[/b] he isn't having that problem now.... Now the server status page says, [b]" You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = '86.96.205.200' OR `ipfield` = '86.96.205.200'' at line 1! [/b] " [b]===================================================================[/b] [b]Ip - 86.96.164.1 , Or Ip - 86.96.54.38[/b] If a Moderator did read this please first try removing my server with the ip above, With respect.
[b]----Akl---- -----------Regards and With love to the Moparscape Community---------[/b]
=============-------------------===================-----------------------=============
[b]P.S - Sorry for any spelling mistakes. My best regards to all![/b]

item.description:
@akl wrote:

Thank you Casey. and God Of Ikikli for taking your time and reading can anyone of you please ask Moparisthebest?

–Akl
---- My regards to all!

@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

akl:

" You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ’ IP= '86.96.205.200' ORipfield` = ‘86.96.205.200’’ at line 1! "

Can only be fixed by Moparisthebest.
